channel.title: SW-FRAMEWORK-Android-AOSP on Memo
channel.description: Recent content in SW-FRAMEWORK-Android-AOSP on Memo

item.description: 針對android 原本的AOSP的android code要怎麼download https://source.android.com/setup/build/downloading preparation Installing Repo Make sure you have a bin/ directory in your home directory and that it is included in your path: mkdir ~/bin PATH=~/bin:$PATH Download the Repo tool and ensure that it is executable: curl https://storage.googleapis.com/git-repo-downloads/repo > ~/bin/repo chmod a+x ~/bin/repo Initializing a Repo client After installing Repo, set up your client to access the Android source repository:會需要填寫好user資訊 mkdir Android-AOSP cd Android-AOSP git config –global user.
